nodes.text: The game of darts was a game played by throwing pointed darts at a circular game board, which could be hung on a wall. These darts would be thrown at the bright dart board, and where they would land determined the score the player received. It was also possible for a dart to miss the board and embed itself in the surrounding wall.
In an unknown cantina, a Rodian could be seen playing darts.
The game of darts has only appeared in one non-canon source. It is possible that the game is indeed included in Star Wars canon; however, a particular source has not been made.
